channel.title: How do i make a Jframe for my client
channel.description: Hey guys i have seen clients with the j frame at the top of them with the file and themes and all dat shiznit how would i add one i have looked all over the forums and couldn't find a way

item.title: How do i make a Jframe for my client
item.dc:creator: @Jordiescape Jordiescape
item.description:
@Jordiescape wrote:

Start off by this:

import java.awt.Component; import java.awt.Frame; import javax.swing.JFrame
I think those are the correct imports.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make a Jframe for my client
